instructions.title: My Instructions
instructions.description: Welcome to My Final Wishes! This comprehensive planner helps you organize important information for your loved ones.
instructions.step1: Navigate using the sidebar on the left
instructions.step2: Fill out each section at your own pace
instructions.step3: Save your progress as you go
instructions.step4: Download or email your completed plan
instructions.tip1: Be thorough but don't stress about perfection
instructions.tip3: Share key information with trusted individuals
instructions.tip4: Include where important documents are stored
instructions.tip5: Note any time-sensitive actions that should be taken
instructions.tip6: Mention key people who should be contacted first
instructions.tip7: Add passwords or access codes for critical accounts
instructions.generalInstructionsHelp: Document locations, time-sensitive actions, key contacts, and access codes
instructions.placeholder: Add any instructions or important notes here...
instructions.suggestedMessage: If you are reading this, it means you have the difficult task of carrying out my final wishes. I want you to know that everything written here was prepared with love, to make this time a little easier for you. My hope is that these pages will guide you ‚Äî not only with the practical details, but also with the memories and words I've left behind. Please trust that what I've recorded is meant to lighten your burden and honor the life we shared. I am deeply grateful for your care and your love. Thank you, with all my heart and soul.

faq.title: Guide & Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: This planner helps you organize and document your end-of-life wishes, making it easier for your loved ones to honor your preferences and handle important matters when the time comes.
faq.a2: Yes, your data is securely stored and encrypted. We recommend using a password manager for sensitive passwords rather than storing them directly in this planner.
faq.q3: How often should I update this?
faq.a3: Review and update your plan at least annually, or whenever significant life changes occur (marriage, divorce, birth, death, major purchases, etc.).
faq.q4: Who should have access to this?
faq.a4: Share your completed plan with your executor, trusted family members, and keep a copy in a secure but accessible location. Make sure key people know where to find it.
faq.q5: Can I make changes after downloading?
faq.a5: Yes, you can update your plan anytime. After making changes, download a new PDF to ensure everyone has the most current version.
faq.q6: What if I don't know all the details yet?
faq.a6: That's okay! Fill out what you can now and add more information over time. It's better to start with partial information than to delay.
faq.a7: We recommend using a password manager and noting 'See password manager' rather than writing passwords directly. If you must include access information, store this document very securely.
faq.a8: This planner is an informational guide for your loved ones. It does not replace legal documents like a will, trust, or advance directive. Consult an attorney for legal matters.
